content: विशिष्ट {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Distinguished, distinct. {@--2@} Particular, special, peculiar, distinctive. {@--3@} Characterized by, endowed with, possessed of, having. {@--4@} Superior, best (of all), eminent, excellent, choice; विशिष्टाया विशेषेण संगमो गुणवान् भवेत् <ls>Mb.</ls> --ष्टः <ab>N.</ab> of Viṣṇu.
